snippet: The Kansas freshman Andrew Wiggins said officially that he was headed to the N.B.A. after his only season with the Jayhawks.
abstract: Kansas freshman forward Andrew Wiggins says officially that he is headed to the NBA after his only season with the Jayhawks; other college basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Kansas freshman Andrew Wiggins said officially that he was headed to the N.B.A. after his only season with the Jayhawks.

headline.main: Andrew Wiggins to Enter N.B.A. Draft
